MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Peter Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.51PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.00PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.05PM on 20th April 2021.
